docs.snippet: A Florida jury delivered a verdict in favor of the former wrestler in a suit over publication of a sex tape. It also found the site’s founder and its former editor liable.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida jury delivered a verdict in favor of the former wrestler in a suit over publication of a sex tape. It also found the site’s founder and its former editor liable.

headline.main: Hulk Hogan Awarded $115 Million in Privacy Suit Against Gawker
headline.print_headline: Hefty Damages to Hulk Hogan in Gawker Suit

byline.original: By NICK MADIGAN and RAVI SOMAIYA

docs.snippet: One championed early music, and the other was a modernist, yet more parallels can be drawn between the two than either might have preferred.
docs.lead_paragraph: One championed early music, and the other was a modernist, yet more parallels can be drawn between the two than either might have preferred.
docs.abstract: Avant-gardist composers and conductors Pierre Boulez and Nikolaus Harnoncourt, who both passed away within two months, had striking similarities and differences in way they helped redefine classical music in latter half of 20th century.

headline.main: Boulez and Harnoncourt, So Different, Yet More Alike Than They Realized
headline.print_headline: Two Musical Titans, So Strikingly Alike in Their Differences

docs.snippet: The offer to buy Affymetrix, a maker of genetic analysis technology, for $1.5 billion tops an existing takeover proposal by Thermo Fisher Scientific.
docs.lead_paragraph: The offer to buy Affymetrix, a maker of genetic analysis technology, for $1.5 billion tops an existing takeover proposal by Thermo Fisher Scientific.

headline.main: Former Affymetrix Executives Seek to Break Up Deal With Own Bid

docs.snippet: In New Jersey's biggest city, fears are growing over lead in the school district's water after a lab found elevated levels in nearly half its schools. The Newark district quickly shut off sinks and fountains in 30 buildings and has offered to test as...
docs.lead_paragraph: In New Jersey's biggest city, fears are growing over lead in the school district's water after a lab found elevated levels in nearly half its schools. The Newark district quickly shut off sinks and fountains in 30 buildings and has offered to test as many as 17,000 kids for contamination.

headline.main: Lead Fears Grow in Newark Schools, but the Problem Isn't New
headline.print_headline: Lead Fears Grow in Newark Schools, but the Problem Isn't New

docs.snippet: British oil major BP and China Oil have been awarded a tender launched by Venezuela's PDVSA to buy some 8 million barrels of Nigerian and U.S. light crude for delivery during the second quarter, traders told Reuters on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: British oil major BP and China Oil have been awarded a tender launched by Venezuela's PDVSA to buy some 8 million barrels of Nigerian and U.S. light crude for delivery during the second quarter, traders told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: Venezuela's PDVSA to Import Light Crude From BP, China Oil-Traders
headline.print_headline: Venezuela's PDVSA to Import Light Crude From BP, China Oil-Traders

docs.snippet: Brazil's state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro SA is considering selling control of fuel distribution unit BR Distribuidora SA after bidders failed to emerge for a minority stake, two sources with direct knowledge of the plans said on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro SA is considering selling control of fuel distribution unit BR Distribuidora SA after bidders failed to emerge for a minority stake, two sources with direct knowledge of the plans said on Friday.

headline.main: Exclusive-Petrobras Mulls Giving Up Control of Fuel Distribution Unit: Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Petrobras Mulls Giving Up Control of Fuel Distribution Unit: Sources

docs.snippet: Michigan health officials have found a 10th fatal case of Legionnaires' disease in the Flint area amid an outbreak some experts have linked to the city's water crisis.
